name: Mountain Thunder
description: Thunder was inspired by painted horses, running free on rough and rugged mountain sides. A mix of pastels and acrylic were used to paint this guy. He also comes with a one of a kind collar, just in case he wanders away during a camping trip. Along with that, he comes with a certificate of authenticity with details about the artist, medium, and inspiration. Figurine Info: *Scale/Size: About 5.5" tall, 5.5" long, 4.5" wingspan *Sculpted in Sculpey, cast in a sturdy urethane resin. *Hand painted with acrylic and pastels. *All sculpting, casting, and special (hand painted) releases are done in the US, by the artist. *Edition: This is a one of a kind, hand painted cast. The number of Demon Dragon which will be cast is currently undetermined. Customs and blank casts are also available here.

name: Snarl the Dragon
description:
This dragon pendant is packed with personality! Snarl loves to spook people passing by with his sharp teeth. Although they're loyal to their humans, you may have to warn others that yes, he does bite!

Snarl measures about 1.5 inches tall and 1.5 inches wide. They're cast in a sturdy resin which is hand painted (by the artist who sculpted them) in acrylic and pastel. You can be sure that much love and time is invested in your pendant! Afterwords, they're sealed in a protective varnish, and will each come with an adjustable necklace cord that best matches the color of the cat. These are full, in the round sculptures, so when they're not in use, they make a great decoration!

Clear orbs are also available in a wide array of colors. Each one is cast around a beautiful glass marble, feel free to ask for a list of the current colors.

Custom paint jobs may be ordered as well, simply order "custom" from the option drop-down, then click "contact" to the right or e-mail me at ccarpenter@wintersoulstudios.com. Be sure to include any references/color choices for the dragon and orb. The "modified" option includes your choice of a small modification (ie. collar, back spikes, different horns, etc.). For custom paints, please allow 1-2 weeks for completion, along with another week or two for shipping.

name: Snatch the Dragon
description:
This dragon pendant is packed with personality! If after you bring Snatch home, don't be surprised if your keys and other jewelry go missing, they're a sneaky bunch that love shiny objects. Of course, you could just wear Snatch every day, this way you always know what your new dragon friend is up to.

Snatch measures about 1.75 inches tall and 1.5 inches wide. They're cast in a sturdy resin which is hand painted (by the artist who sculpted them) in acrylic and pastel. You can be sure that much love and time is invested in your pendant! Afterwords, they're sealed in a protective varnish, and will each come with an adjustable necklace cord that best matches the color of the cat. These are full, in the round sculptures, so when they're not in use, they make a great decoration!

Clear orbs are also available in a wide array of colors. Each one is cast around a beautiful glass marble, feel free to ask for a list of the current colors.

Custom paint jobs may be ordered as well, simply order "custom" from the option drop-down, then click "contact" to the right or e-mail me at ccarpenter@wintersoulstudios.com. Be sure to include any references/color choices for the dragon and orb. The "modified" option includes your choice of a small modification (ie. collar, crown feathers, etc.). For custom paints, please allow 1-2 weeks for completion, along with another week or two for shipping.

name: Jersey Devil
description: Finally, I've painted a demon dragon in the like-ness of the creature which inspired the Demon Dragon resin- the Jersey Devil! This one's nickname is "Mr. Leeds". If he's left to charge in the sunlight, come dusk you may catch a glimpse of his glowing green eyes! He also comes with a certificate of authenticity with details about the artist, medium, and inspiration. Figurine Info: *Scale/Size: About 5.5" tall, 5.5" long, 4.5" wingspan *Sculpted in Sculpey, cast in a sturdy urethane resin. *Hand painted with acrylic and pastels. *All sculpting, casting, and special (hand painted) releases are done in the US, by the artist. *Edition: This is a one of a kind, hand painted cast. The number of Demon Dragon which will be cast is currently undetermined. Customs and blank casts are also available here.

name: Feline Pendant
description:
While the original "Cat Light" pendants are still around, I wanted to also have a shorthair cat available with a body and face type that was slightly different from the original. These ones are little less than 2 inches tall and about 1.5 inches wide, slightly larger in comparison to the original cat pendants. They're cast in a sturdy resin which is hand painted (by the artist who sculpted them) in acrylic and pastel. You can be sure that much love and time is invested in your pendant! Afterwords, they're sealed in a protective varnish, and will each come with an adjustable necklace cord that best matches the color of the cat. These are full, in the round sculptures, so when they're not in use, they make a great decoration!

Clear orbs are also available in a wide array of colors. Each one is cast around a beautiful glass marble, feel free to ask for a list of the current colors.

Custom paint jobs may be ordered as well, simply order "custom" from the option drop-down, then click "contact" to the right or e-mail me at ccarpenter@wintersoulstudios.com. Be sure to include any references/color choices for the cat and orb. The "modified" option includes your choice of a small modification (ie. collar, wings, etc.). For custom paints, please allow 1-2 weeks for completion, along with another week or two for shipping.

name: Bat Pendant
description:
The perfect pendant for those who have always wanted a bat, these guys are happy to hang around your neck all day (and night)! Each bat measures about 2 inches wide, and 1.5 inches long. They're cast in a sturdy resin which is hand painted later in acrylic and pastel. To be sure of the sturdy-ness of your bat, they're sealed in a protective varnish coat. Every pendant will come with its own necklace cord (lobster clasp with adjustable length). These are full, in the round sculptures, so when they're not in use, they make a great decoration!

If you love to paint, this one, the betta fish, and the reindeer are currently the only pendants from Winter Soul Studios that may be purchased unpainted. The blank cast will be primed and ready to paint. The unpainted option also comes with cord and a jump ring- disassembled of course, (wouldn't want to accidentally paint the cord!)

Custom paint jobs may be ordered as well, simply order "custom" from the option drop-down, then click "contact" to the right or e-mail me at ccarpenter@wintersoulstudios.com. Be sure to include any references/color choices for the bat. For custom paints, please allow 1-2 weeks for completion, along with another week or two for shipping.

name: Cat Light Pendants
description: The idea for these were based off of odd childhood experiences that still make for quite a powerful memory to this day! Pendants were first sculpted in super sculpey, measuring about 1.5 inches tall and a bit over an inch long. They were then cast by the artist in a sturdy resin. Afterwords, each one is hand painted in acrylic and given a protective varnish coat. Each will come with its own necklace cord. Since these are full, in the round sculptures, when not in use as a pendant they also work well as detailed decoration! Clear orbs are back open for business! The clear orb cats are each cast around a beautiful glass marble. A variety of clear orbs are available for custom orders, feel free to ask for a list of the current colors. Custom paint jobs may be ordered as well, simply order "custom" from the option drop-down, then click "contact" to the right or e-mail me at ccarpenter@wintersoulstudios.com. Be sure to include any references/color choices for the cat and orb. The "modified" option includes bat wings, feathered wings, or your choice of a small modification (ie. collar, bracelets, mane, etc.). For custom paints, please allow 1-2 weeks for completion, along with another week or two for shipping. Come see past custom paints!

name: Demon Dragon Figurine
description: Originally based on folklore of the Jersey Devil, but designed to have a versatility in personalities/looks for those who love draconic creatures in all shapes and sizes! Figurine Info: *Scale/Size: About 5.5" tall, 5.5" long, 4.5" wingspan *Sculpted in Sculpey, cast in a sturdy urethane resin. *All sculpting, casting, and special (hand painted) releases are done in the US, by the artist. *Option of four different horns/antlers. *Edition: Currently undetermined. Most likely I'll keep it to one mold (30-50 casts). *Customizing is allowed as long as you do not reproduce the piece - so feel free to try out different manes/spikes/etc. on these guys! Options: *Unpainted *Special Paints -Desert Dunes - For Sale Here -Mountain Thunder - For Sale Here -Jersey Devil - For Sale Here *Custom Painted - Hand painted by the artist, you choose the colors/patterns When ordering, please leave a note or contact me to let me know your choice of horns or antlers (see the horn choice reference image). Custom orders will also need to include any references and color choices. WIP photos will be sent for customs, be sure to check your e-mail for quicker production time. Please allow 3-4 weeks for completion, along with another week or two for shipping.

name: Hippocamp Figurine
description: This figurine was inspired by the Hippocamp ACEO series - imagine the possibilities for colors! Figurine Info: *Scale/Size: 3" tall x 5.5" long *Sculpted in Sculpey, cast in a sturdy urethane resin. *All sculpting, casting, and special (hand painted) releases are done in the US, by the artist. *Edition: Currently undetermined. Most likely I'll keep it to one mold (30-50 casts). *Customizing is allowed as long as you do not reproduce the piece - so feel free to try out different fins/etc. on these guys! Options: *Unpainted *Special Paints - Hand painted by the artist: -Chilly - For Sale Here -Sappheiros - For Sale Here -Pyrrhos - For Sale Here *Custom Painted - Hand painted by the artist, you choose the colors/patterns When ordering a custom paint job, click "contact" to the left or e-mail me at ccarpenter@wintersoulstudios.com. Be sure to include any references/color choices. WIP photos will be sent, be sure to check your e-mail for quicker production time. For custom paints, please allow 3-4 weeks for completion, along with another week or two for shipping.

name: Dog Pendant
description:
The canine counterpart to the cat and owl pendants is finally here! These highly detailed pendants were sculpted by the artist, measure about 2 inches tall, and are also cast by the artist in a sturdy resin. Afterwords, each one is hand painted in acrylic and given a protective varnish coat. Every pendant will come with its own necklace cord (lobster clasp with adjustable length). Since these are full, in the round sculptures, when not in use as a pendant they also work well as small decoration!

Custom paint jobs may be ordered as well, simply order "custom" from the option drop-down, then click "contact" to the right or e-mail me at ccarpenter@wintersoulstudios.com. Be sure to include any references/color choices for the dog and orb. The "Custom - Modified" option includes bat wings, feathered wings, or your choice of a small modification (ie. collar, bracelets, tails, etc.). For custom paints, please allow 1-2 weeks for completion, along with another week or two for shipping.

name: Caribou Ornament
description:
Although caribou are perfect for the winter season, these are also perfect for all those cervine lovers out there, regardless of the time of year!

Much like the pendants, these tiny ornaments are full, in the round, detailed sculptures. Each deer is 2 in tall and 2 in wide. These are sculpted, painted, and cast by the artist, so much love is put into each individual piece. These will most likely be cast in a limited amount - right now I'm aiming for 20 casts.

Custom paints are open - your choice of ribbon and colors!
Simply order "custom" from the option drop-down, then click "contact" to the right or e-mail me at ccarpenter@wintersoulstudios.com. Be sure to include any references/color choices. For custom paints, please allow 1-2 weeks for completion, along with another week or two for shipping.

Check back later for photos of some completed caribou!

name: Cumulous Cats - Sunset Storm
description: Back in 2010, a certain blue British Shorthair inspired the idea of cats that are made of clouds. With his thunderous purrs, static filled fur, and mischievous nature, surely at one time he had dabbled in weather creation! Two years later, plenty time has passed to explore the huge variety of weather, each one a reflection of feline personality. In this storm, high wind cats Whirlwind and Hurricane chase leaves and brew wicked storms. Gloomy foreshadows Downpour, who would love to rain on your parade, but no need to despair! The rain will help bring much needed relief to the dry ground. This storm is especially lucky, for the rare Thunder Snow makes an appearance, bringing a chaotic mix of Summer and Winter weather. Heading the storm is one of the original Cumulous Cats, Sunset Storm. This storm's forecast: *One quality print of the illustration shown. *Orange Cumulous Cat magnet, (about 4.5 inches on the longest side). *Whirlwind, Gloomy, Downpour, Hurricane, and Thundersnow magnets (each around 2-2.5 inches). Original Cumulous Cats: Magnets Stickers

name: Cumulous Cats - Thunderstorm
description: Back in 2010, a certain blue British Shorthair inspired the idea of cats that are made of clouds. With his thunderous purrs, static filled fur, and mischievous nature, surely at one time he had dabbled in weather creation! Two years later, plenty time has passed to explore the huge variety of weather, each one a reflection of feline personality. Beware, this storm has brewed some fierce kittens! While Wildfire loves leaping through ferocious flames, Blizzard is sure to bring the coldest of breezes. Hail and Lightning can spend the entire day play fighting- all in preparation to become formidable severe thunderstorms. Meanwhile, Snowflake, although small, overnight can bury an entire house in snow! These courageous kittens are under the training of one of the original Cumulous Cats, Thunderstorm. This storm's forecast: *One quality print of the illustration shown. *Blue Cumulous Cat magnet, (about 4.5 inches on the longest side). *Lightning, Hail, Snowflake (Lumi), Wildfire, and Blizzard magnets, (each around 2-2.5 inches). Original Cumulous Cats: Magnets Stickers

name: Cumulous Cats - Morning Storm
description: Back in 2010, a certain blue British Shorthair inspired the idea of cats that are made of clouds. With his thunderous purrs, static filled fur, and mischievous nature, surely at one time he had dabbled in weather creation! Two years later, plenty time has passed to explore the huge variety of weather, each one a reflection of feline personality. The extreme personalities of a storm can strike awe and wonder in a person, this storm is no exception! While Twister and Dustdevil take joy in destruction, Foggy and Rainbow Mist are content to curl up in a peaceful valley. In the Autumn Jack Frost often leaves the sparkling gift of frost at the doorstep! All kittens will be under the supervision of Cumulous Cat original White Cloud. This storm's forecast: *One quality print of the illustration shown. *White Cumulous Cat magnet, (about 4.5 inches on the longest side). *Twister, Foggy, Jack Frost, Dust Devil, and Rainbow Mist magnets, (each around 2-2.5 inches). Original Cumulous Cats: Magnets Stickers

name: Pyrrhos the Hippocamp
description: Pyrrhos, brother to Sappheiros. This one's coloration is based on Betta macrostoma. Last fall Pyrrhos and his brother traveled to Spookie Oakie and placed quite well in the fantasy class, Pyrrhos here took first! I had been debating if I want to try entering him in more shows. Who knows, I may still do so if time permits or he's not sold by the next showing opportunity. If he is sold though, the new owner will find a nice shiny ribbon with him! Figurine Info: *Scale/Size: 3" tall x 5.5" long *Sculpted in Sculpey, cast in a sturdy urethane resin. *All sculpting, casting, and special (hand painted) releases are done in the US, by the artist. *Edition: This is a one of a kind, hand painted cast. The number of Hippocamp which will be cast is currently undetermined. Customs and blank casts are also available here.

name: Sappheiros the Hippocamp
description: Here's Sappheiros, one of the first Hippocamp to be painted. The idea is that he's literally a -blue- roan. Last year Sappheiros travelled all the way to Oklahoma to compete in Spookie Oakie. He and his brother, Pyrrhos, placed quite well in the fantasy class. Sappheiros was in second, so whoever takes this guy home will also take home a nice shiny ribbon! Figurine Info: *Scale/Size: 3" tall x 5.5" long *Sculpted in Sculpey, cast in a sturdy urethane resin. *All sculpting, casting, and special (hand painted) releases are done in the US, by the artist. *Edition: This is a one of a kind, hand painted cast. The number of Hippocamp which will be cast is currently undetermined. Customs and blank casts are also available here.

name: Desert Dunes
description: This Demon Dragon's coat is based on the markings of an Arabian Oryx. A mix of pastels and acrylic were used. Also, this year I came across some tiny bits of turquoise at the rock and mineral show, I couldn't help but pick some up to make him his own, unique pendant that matches his eyes! It's super tiny, about the size of a cat's claw. Along with that, he comes with a certificate of authenticity with details about the artist, medium, and inspiration. Figurine Info: *Scale/Size: About 5.5" tall, 5.5" long, 4.5" wingspan *Sculpted in Sculpey, cast in a sturdy urethane resin. *Hand painted with acrylic and pastels. *Necklace is made from real turquoise. *All sculpting, casting, and special (hand painted) releases are done in the US, by the artist. *Edition: This is a one of a kind, hand painted cast. The number of Demon Dragon which will be cast is currently undetermined. Customs and blank casts are also available here.

name: Chilly the Hippocamp
description: Meet Chilly, he's a Hippocamp who comes from frigid northern waters. If you're lucky, you'll see a glint of silver and blue amongst pillars of ice! This is hand painted by the sculptor in pastel and acrylic, and is truly a one-of-a-kind sculpture. The white scale on his head is actually a real opal stone, cut just for him. It flashes green and red at just the right angle! (As a note, it's just the larger stone that's opal, the smaller bit below is pearly acrylic paint). Figurine Info: *Scale/Size: 3" tall x 5.5" long *Sculpted in Sculpey, cast in a sturdy urethane resin. *All sculpting, casting, and special (hand painted) releases are done in the US, by the artist. *Edition: This is a one of a kind, hand painted cast. The number of Hippocamp which will be cast is currently undetermined. Customs and blank casts are also available here.

name: Grab Bag Prints
description: Mini Print Grab Bag: Comes with three ACEO-sized prints (2.5 x 3.5 inches). Large Print Grab Bag: Comes with five 8.5" x 11" prints, and two ACEO-sized prints. All prints are done on a high quality Epson ink jet printer, and of course each is checked for quality. Since I usually sell prints for $5-10 a piece at shows, this is great for those looking for a deal, or even for those looking for a fun gift for multiple people! As "grab bag" suggests, the prints are randomized. I do try to add a variety of colors and favorites in each pack, but for the most part these prints are a mystery!

name: Cumulous Cats - Original
description:
A rumble-purr sounds as these cats wander by, and sparks are sure to be seen flying through their soft fur. Cumulous cats might rain on your parade, but they'll be sure to do it with a delightful smile! 

Each cat is approximately 4.5 inches on their longest side, and about 4 inches on their shortest side.

name: Betta Fish Pendants
description:
For all those Betta Fish enthusiasts out there, this is a great way to show off your favorite Betta's vibrant colors! These highly detailed pendants were sculpted by the artist, measure about 2 inches long, and are also cast by the artist in a sturdy resin. Afterwords, each one is hand painted in acrylic and given a protective varnish coat. Every pendant will come with its own necklace cord (lobster clasp with adjustable length). Since these are full, in the round sculptures, when not in use as a pendant they also work well as small decoration!

If you love to paint, this one, the bat, and the reindeer are currently the only pendants from Winter Soul Studios that may be purchased unpainted. The blank cast will be primed and ready to paint. The unpainted option also comes with cord and a jump ring- disassembled of course, (wouldn't want to accidentally paint the cord!)

Custom paint jobs may be ordered as well, simply order "custom" from the option drop-down, then click "contact" to the right or e-mail me at ccarpenter@wintersoulstudios.com to let me know how you would like it to be painted. For custom paints, please allow 1-2 weeks for completion, along with another week or two for shipping.

name: ACEO Original - Betta Love
description:
An original ACEO card from the "Hippocamp Series," done in a mix of Copic and Prismacolor markers. The aim of the series was to show off the colors and fin shapes of actual fish, but in the form of a mythological creature called the Hippocamp. The featured fish in this one is the Betta. 

The ACEO original will come matted in black, (measuring about 5.5" x 6.5" with the mat), and will be in a clear protective re-sealable bag.

name: ACEO Original - Blenny
description:
An original ACEO card from the "Hippocamp Series," done in a mix of Copic and Prismacolor markers. The aim of the series was to show off the colors and fin shapes of actual fish, but in the form of a mythological creature called the Hippocamp.

The ACEO original will come matted in black, (measuring about 5.5" x 6.5" with the mat), and will come in a clear protective re-sealable bag.

name: ACEO Original - Saffron Flower
description:
An original ACEO card, inspired by my spunky n' sweet green Quaker Parakeet, Boogie! While the yellow mutations do not occur in the wild, it would be wonderful to see them hanging out in a lush green setting with beautiful flowers all around.

This piece was created with a mix of Copic and Prismacolor markers. The ACEO will come matted in black, (measuring about 5.5" x 6.5" with the mat), and will also come in a clear protective re-sealable bag.

name: ACEO Original - Azure Paradise
description:
An original ACEO card, inspired by my spunky n' sweet green Quaker Parakeet, Boogie! While the blue mutations do not occur in the wild, it would be wonderful to see them hanging out in a lush green setting with beautiful flowers all around.

This piece was created with a mix of Copic and Prismacolor markers. The ACEO will come matted in black, (measuring about 5.5" x 6.5" with the mat), and will also come in a clear protective re-sealable bag.
